SELECT PK_NOTICE_SEQ AS pkNoticeSeq , PK_FILE_SEQ AS pkFileSeq , PK_SUBJECT_SEQ AS pkSubjectSeq , TITLE AS title , CONTENTS AS contents , ETC AS etc , USE_YN AS useYn , DEL_YN AS delYn , REGIST_ID AS registId , DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS registDt , UPDATE_ID AS updateId , DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS updateDt
FROM NOTICE WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY PK_NOTICE_SEQ ASC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
